column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////This place just recently opened a week ago
column2: and it did not disappoint. The place is absolutely gorgeous
column3: brick wall throughout inside and has a rustic feel to it. The bar staff is awesome
column5: if you like whiskey they have a large selection to choose from. Little pricey
column6: but they mentioned they're adding a happy hour menu. Great vibes at this place and great people working there.
